page.title: 09CASTLE HORNECK Y.H.
page.content: The Youth Hostel is a good place to stay in.To stay in Castle Horneck with meals it is not much money.For breakfast you pay Â£1.40,for a lunch pack you pay 95p and for supper you pay Â£1.80.To stay without meals if you are over 5 and under 16 you pay Â£2.25. If you are over 16 you pay Â£2.80.If you are over 21 you pay Â£3.40.Add the food money onto your age group money and that's what you pay to stay with meals. There are 9 dormitories. In the dormitories there are bunk beds. There are male and female dormitories.Castle Horneck is open all year except February when they paint and clean the hostel.They have a shop and a special kitchen for people who cook their own food,also a cafeteria. Alv. Castle Horneck is situated in seclud- ed woodland, West of Penzance.
